alert.note: Alert for Central Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 4:17PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Piscataquis County through 445 PM EDT... At 416 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Blanchard, or 11 miles southwest of Greenville, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greenville, Monson, Blanchard, Elliottsville, Shirley and Willimantic. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
